ttp_template:
<group name="group_interface_metric_preference">
Metric: {{PREFERENCE | ORPHRASE}}
Group: {{GROUP | ORPHRASE}}
RP: {{RP | ORPHRASE}}
Interface: {{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}}
Metric: {{METRIC | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Group: 239.0.0.1
RP: 192.168.0.1
Interface: GigabitEthernet0/1
Metric: 110
Preference: 100

Group: 239.1.1.1
RP: 192.168.0.2
Interface: GigabitEthernet0/2
Metric: 120
Preference: 110

Group: 239.2.2.2
RP: 192.168.0.3
Interface: GigabitEthernet0/3
Metric: 130
Preference: 120
textfsm_template:
Value GROUP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value RP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value PREFERENCE (\d+)

Start
  ^Group:\s+${GROUP}\s*$$
  ^RP:\s+${RP}\s*$$
  ^Interface:\s+${INTERFACE}\s*$$
  ^Metric:\s+${METRIC}\s*$$
  ^Preference:\s+${PREFERENCE}\s*$$ -> Record
